text:
1. Create a new article in the default publication underneath Tutorial and
publish it
2. Do a search here. It doesn't work, because the URL for searching is
<form action="../search-live/lucene">
But in this new article, we are one level deeper (live/tutorial).

I have a proposed bug-fix:
in file xslt/navigation/search.xsl :
add the line <xsl:param name="root"/> at the beginning
then replace 
   <form action="{@page} ... 
with 
   <form action="{$root}

The variable root contains the base context of the publication, so the bug would
be resolved. Since I am new to Lenya, I don't know if this bug fix is "how it
should be": so I will leave this to the authors to determine, instead of filing
a proposed patch.
